album.title: The Complete Billie Holiday On Verve 1945 - 1959

wiki.content:
"Lady Sings The Blues" is the title track of Billie Holiday's 1956 album written by Holiday and noted jazz pianist Herbie Nichols. The song also featured as the title track of a movie about Holiday's life (starring Diana Ross) and has been covered numerous times by the likes of Ella Fitzgerald, Diana Ross and Smokey Robinson.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Lady Sings The Blues" is the title track of Billie Holiday's 1956 album written by Holiday and noted jazz pianist Herbie Nichols. The song also featured as the title track of a movie about Holiday's life (starring Diana Ross) and has been covered numerous times by the likes of Ella Fitzgerald, Diana Ross and Smokey Robinson.

track.name: Lady Sings the Blues
comments: Like how it kicks in at the begining.
THE blues woman of every times!!
So inspiring and full of feeling.
The word to describe Billie Holiday is Passion. It is in everything she sings, Great Passion.
The epic horn section in the beginning never seizes to send chills up my spine. Quite possibly the greatest track from one of the greatest singers ever to grace the face of the earth.
Billie sends a shiver up my spine!
damn she sounded stoned when she was talking. I guess Amy Winehouse is our generation's Billie Holiday! ;D
Oh moderators, where art thou? Get over here and read what coolbeanie said. Then *do* something. Thanks in advance.

SOUNDS OF OUR TIMES (S.O.O.T.) is an issue based music orientated TV and Radio series. Linked to the United Nations to help build awareness for their MDGs (www.un.org/millenniumgoals/) and the UDHR (www.un.org/Overview/rights.html) with an aim to educate through entertainment. 

Similar to:  MTV Cribs meets VH1s Story Tells meets This is Your Life with depth.

This all star weekly series will feature live performances like never seen before by the general public  (free flowing jam session with friends and peers in a home style setting) along side celeb PSA's and doco style footage introducing the featured charity of the week.  Each episode will focus on a different charity (which fall with-in the MDGs scope (Education, Environment, Poverty, Health, The Children and Human Rights) through the eyes of the headlining talent.   

http://www.youtube.com/user/SOUNDSOFOURTIMES
